outputs.output_descr: Project preparation grant for the development of a GEF Full sized project on "Scaling up adaptation in Zimbabwe - with a focus on rural livelihoods, by strengthening integrated planning systems"

project_descr: Preparation of  a climate change adaptation project  aimed at scaling up concrete rural adaptation strategies in the agriculture sector
project_title: Proposal Prep. Grant Scaling Up Adaptation in Zimbabwe
